name: With/out Honor
description:
With/out Honor

Escape from the mysterious dream, and fight your way out of it. You can teleport through thin walls and through your enemies. Even so, you should fight with honor. Or maybe don't. But be ready for the consequences if you attack the enemy's back. The same applies to them too, so be prepared to unleash your power if you get attacked on the back multiple times!

Controls

Left and right arrow keys - Move

Up arrow key - Jump and Double Jump

Z - Teleport

X - Attack

C - Unleash Power

Assets

Sprites and other visual assets are self-made

SFX assets used are from opengameart.org and freesound.org

Music assets used are from onemansymphony.bandcamp.com

Fonts used are either self-made or by Daniel Linssen

More detailed credits are available in the game and in the repository

GitLab Repository

https://gitlab.com/myusufharahap/with-out-honor
